description:
Luffy recalls a time when Captain Red-Haired Shanks taught him a valuable lesson in friendship and set him on his quest to be King of the Pirates.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le passé de Luffy ! L`apparition de Shanks Le Roux
Luffy no Kako! Akagami no Shanks Toujou
ماضي لوفي! وصول صاحب الشعر الأحمر شانكس!
อดีตของลูฟี่! แชงคูสปรากฏตัว!
ルフィの過去! 赤髪のシャンクス登場
路飞的过去！红发的香克斯登场
루피의 과거! 북은 머리 샹크스 등장
